sentences.sContent: He is a carpenter by profession.
At an early age, I was apprenticed to a carpenter.
sentences.sCn: 我小时候曾给木匠当过学徒。

sentences.sContent: That carpenter wanted to become a lawyer， but he was advised to stick to his last.
sentences.sCn: 那个木匠想当律师， 但别人劝他安分守己地干他自己的老本行。

remMethod.val: 美国的卡朋特兄妹组合(Carpenter)就是这个名字

words.tran: 木器；木工手艺；[木] 木工业

trans.tranOther: someone whose job is making and repairing wooden objects
